title: Engineering MXene for Electrochemical Environmental Pollutant Sensing
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00255E, Critical Review
Muhammad Hussnain Afzal, Wajeeha Pervaiz, Muhammad Asif, Zhuo Huang, Jiawei Dai, You Xu, Jiannan Zhu, Tiansui Zhang, Zhuang Rao, Guangfang Li, Zhengyun Wang, Hongfang Liu
Environmental pollutant sensing is essential to sustainable development of human health and ecosystem. MXenes as a category of two-dimensional materials consisting of nitrides and carbides have emerged as highly attractive...
